title: About Us
description: Learn about SGIP Real Estate - your trusted partner in luxury real estate in UAE.

hero.title: Your Trusted Real Estate Partner
hero.subtitle: Over a decade of excellence in luxury real estate investments in UAE.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2014, SGIP Real Estate began as a vision to bridge the gap between international investors and premium real estate opportunities. What started as a small team with big dreams has grown into one of the most trusted names in luxury real estate across three continents.
story.paragraph2: Our journey has been marked by unwavering commitment to excellence, integrity, and client satisfaction. We believe that every property transaction is more than just a business deal â€“ it's about helping our clients achieve their dreams and build lasting wealth through strategic real estate investments.
story.paragraph3: Today, with over 500 successful transactions and a 98% client satisfaction rate, we continue to set new standards in the industry while maintaining the personal touch that has defined us from the beginning.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We conduct business with the highest ethical standards, ensuring transparency and honesty in all our dealings.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace cutting-edge technology and innovative approaches to provide superior service and market insights.

clientFocus.title: Client Focus
clientFocus.description: Our clients' success is our success. We prioritize their needs and work tirelessly to exceed their expectations.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service, from initial consultation to final transaction completion.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Our clients can count on us to deliver consistent, dependable service and support throughout their journey.

results.title: Results
results.description: We focus on delivering measurable results and long-term value for our clients' real estate investments.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Experienced professionals dedicated to your success

members.name: Rustam Umurzakov
members.description: Main competencies real estate transactions in Dubai-Moscow-Zurich, investment strategies. Successful with high experience in UAE since 2008.

members.name: Kseniya Grishina
members.description: Managing business activities aimed at innovation to improve products & services. Responsible for carrying out research in various company departments, establishing their feasibility in terms of investment.

members.name: Ramina Semetova

members.name: Rushana Damini
members.description: Expert in property consultation with focus on client satisfaction and market expertise

members.name: Vishal Dhanak
members.description: Specialized in property investment consulting and market analysis

members.name: Yanina Dydynskaya
members.description: Result-oriented and self-driven leader, who achieves goals and motivate others through strong communication skills and team leadership

members.name: Anna Krotova
members.description: Specialist in areas: Palm Jumeirah and Dubai Marina

2024.title: Future Vision
